title: FT: Sovereign 460 Hal Chase Holding Trophy SGC 60
author: Tobacco&Gum

posts.post_title: FT: Sovereign 460 Hal Chase Holding Trophy SGC 60
posts.post_content:
Hey Guys,

Looking to trade this card. Most of my cards are poor to good, so this one sticks out like a sore thumb. :p

FWIW, it's  the highest graded by SGC, and the only one graded higher is a PSA 6. 

In return I'd be looking for a NY Amreican player in poor to vg condition with Cycle 460, AB460, Carolina Brights,  Piedy 42, or BL350 reverse.

I wouldn't be opposed to cash going one way or the other to get a deal done, but I'm not looking to sell it outright at this time.

Thanks!

[IMG]http://i1049.photobucket.com/albums/s386/TheBabe1918/IMG_0001_NEW_zps08bf7077.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i1049.photobucket.com/albums/s386/TheBabe1918/IMG_0004_NEW_zps9a019380.jpg[/IMG]
Bump, still looking for a trade. Thanks.
just take it out of the slab rough it up and then it will match the rest of your set. Problem solved:D
if I didn't abort the 460 sub:D
